title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 563.5 - Types of parking violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 563.5 - Types of parking violations

State Regulations
(a) Parking without a valid college permit. (b) Parking in an unauthorized space or
lot. (c) Parking which interferes
with the use of a fire hydrant, fire access lane or other emergency
zone. (d) Parking which blocks any
other vehicle. (e) Parking which
interferes with the free and proper use of a roadway, driveway or entrance to a
parking lot. (f) Parking in a
metered parking space after the meter has expired. (g) Parking in a service driveway or service
area to include blocking a dumpster. (h) Parking on a grassy area. (i) Blocking or interfering with the proper
use of a crosswalk or sidewalk. (j) Parking where signs or road markings prohibit parking. (k) Parking in handicap parking space without
the proper pass. (l) Parking in a
visitor space without the proper pass. (m) Parking in a reserved area without the
proper pass. (n) Overnight parking
in an unauthorized parking lot. (o) Permit not properly displayed. (p) Parking in any area not specifically designated as a parking lot or space on
college premises. (q) Parking in
violation of temporary instructions during a declared snow emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
563.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
